text: The 1977 Belgian Cup Final, took place on 12 June 1977 between Anderlecht and Club Brugge. It was the 22nd Belgian Cup final and only the first final in which Club Brugge and Anderlecht met each other. Club Brugge won the match 4-3. ==Route to the final== {| width="100%" style="text-align:center" |- style="vertical-align:top; background:#9cf;" !colspan=3 style="width:1*"|Club Brugge ! !colspan=3 style="width:1*"|Anderlecht |- style="vertical-align:top; background:#c1e0ff;" |Opponent |Result |Legs | style="background:#c1e0ff;"|Round |Opponent |Result |Legs |- |Stade Braine |5–0 |5–0 home | style="background:#c1e0ff;"|Round of 64 |AC Olen |2–1 |2–1 home |- |Gerhees Oostham |10–1 |10–1 home | style="background:#c1e0ff;"|Round of 32 |KWS Club Lauwe |7–0 |7–0 home |- |Lokeren |1–0 |1–0 home | style="background:#c1e0ff;"|Round of 16 |Olympic Montignies |1–0 |1–0 away |- |Winterslag |3–1 |3–1 home | style="background:#c1e0ff;"|Quarter-finals |Tongeren |3–0 |3–0 home |- |Waregem |4–2 |4–2 home | style="background:#c1e0ff;"|Semi-finals |Cercle Brugge |3–2 |3–2 home |} ==Match== ===Summary=== During the first half, Anderlecht scored from three long range shots, with Club Brugge barely managing to hang on and happy to go into the break only one goal down at 3-2. During the second half Roger Davies turned the tide as he scored twice to hand Club Brugge the cup. ===Details=== {| width=92% |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK || || Jan Ruiter |- |RB || || Gilbert Van Binst |- |CB || || Hugo Broos |- |CB || || Erwin Vandendaele |- |LB || || Jean Thissen |- |MF || || Jean Dockx |- |MF || || Arie Haan |- |MF || || Ludo Coeck |- |MF || || Franky Vercauteren |- |FW || || François Van der Elst |- |FW || || Peter Ressel |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Raymond Goethals |} |valign="top"|300px |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK || || Birger Jensen |- |RB || || Fons Bastijns |- |CB || || Georges Leekens |- |CB || || Eduard Krieger || |- |LB || || Jos Volders |- |MF || || Julien Cools |- |MF || || René Vandereycken |- |MF || || Dirk Sanders |- |MF || || Ulrik le Fevre |- |FW || || Raoul Lambert || |- |FW || || Roger Davies |- |colspan=4|Substitutes: |- |CB || || Gino Maes || |- |FW || || Dirk Hinderyckx || |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Ernst Happel |} |} {| width=100% style="font-size: 90%" | Assistant referees: Jan Peeters Roger Schoeters |style="width:60%; vertical-align:top;"| Match rules *90 minutes. *30 minutes of extra time if necessary. *Penalty shoot-out if scores still level. *Maximum of three substitutions. |} ==External links== * 1977 Cup Final Category:Club Brugge KV matches Category:R.S.C.
